info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 2:35PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pima and northeastern Santa Cruz Counties through 315 PM MST... At 235 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Sonoita, or 16 miles southeast of Green Valley, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sahuarita, Green Valley, Tubac, East Sahuarita, Sonoita, Elgin, Amado, Madera Canyon and Arivaca Junction. This includes the following highways... Interstate 19 between mile markers 21 and 45. Route 82 between mile markers 25 and 36. Route 83 between mile markers 25 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
